Package gov.nih.nci.ncia.queryhandler

Interface Summary
IQueryHandler It appears that a query handler is an object that takes a "query object" and turns it into HQL to go to the database.
 

Class Summary
ContentTypeQueryHandler  
CurationDataQueryHandler Written to adhere closer to the previous design of using Handlers
DataBasketAnnotationsQueryHandler  
DataBasketQueryHandler Handles a query that retrieves series to be placed in the data basket.
DICOMPatientQueryHandler  
DICOMQueryHandler Process a provided query in to an HQL statement and pass it to Hibernate
DICOMSeriesQueryHandler Handles a query that retrieves images for a series
LatestCurationDateQueryHandler Ther name "curation" here doesn't have anything to do with what you might normally think of when you here curation.
QuarantinedFileQueryHandler Build and execute HQL query to get project and site information for quarantined files.
QueryHandlerProxy  
RemoteSiteQueryHandler  
VerifySubmissionQueryHandler Build and execute HQL query
